title: Presenting South Australia. No. 4
creator_credit: South Australian Government Tourist Bureau and Geoffrey Shepherd
brief_description: Magazine items: Art in the open: a survey of the Open Air Art Exhibitions held annually in various parks around Adelaide. Historic residence in the hills: eight miles from Adelaide at the Bellair National Park is the Old Government House. Down at the wharf: a boy spends a pleasant Sunday afternoon at Port Adelaide.
